text: Halloweentown is without a doubt one of the most cherished Disney Channel original movie franchises with some of the most passionate fans on Earth. That's why fans revolted when Disney recast Kimberly J. Brown's Marnie without reason in the fourth movie and fans refuse to acknowledge the movie's existence to this day. These days, fans are desperate for a fifth movie starring the original Marnie, and apparently, that wish isn't too far out of the realm of reality. Sheri Singer, the executive producer of the series, chatted EOnline about the prospect of a fifth movie and she's beyond down for the cause. ` ` I'd have to get Disney Channel to get on - board, but I would like to,'' Sheri said. ` ` I have ideas
